description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large one-bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,695 per month. 

This One-Bedroom is available 01/14/2022


Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more! 

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment. 

The Upgraded Apartment Homes at Casa Mira View offer an exclusive residential experience with tailored amenities including Nest® Thermostat, SkyBell® WiFi Video Doorbell, and other exquisite features. 

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

This One Bedroom will be available Jan 3rd.



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, concert stage, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. description:
Situated in La Jolla, this LEVEL ENTRY, newly painted 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM Condominium is centrally located in the highly desired development of Southpointe! The updated kitchen features LG stainless steel appliances including an 'easyclean' stovetop oven. The large family room features high ceilings, wood laminate floors, fireplace with mantle, and shuttered windows with an unobstructed view of the Villa La Jolla Park! The Master Bedroom has high ceilings, a ceiling fan, beautiful sliding barn doors, updated Master Bathroom with dual sink vanity, tile flooring, and glass enclosed walk-in shower. The front yard is gardener-maintained through the HOA. The large backyard patio is completely enclosed with a 6ft fence for excellent privacy, and includes a gate with LEVEL ENTRY ACCESS to the street. Easy street parking for visitors and guests. The 2-car ATTACHED GARAGE features ample storage shelving on both sides as well as a loft space for extra storage. Laundry, Washer and Dryer are located in the garage alongside a utility sink with a workbench. The garage also features a 220-VOLT OUTLET to plug-in your electric vehicle! Carpeted rooms cleaned with Zerorez carpet cleaning on 11/18/21. This corner lot is directly across the street from the park and within a short walking distance to each of the 3 Southpointe community pools! No AC necessary as this location gets excellent air flow.

It is a .8 mile walk to La Jolla Village Square (Starbucks, Trader Joe's, Ralphs, Yoga Six, Club Pilates, Urban Plates, DSW, AMC Theatre, Petsmart and MTS Mid-Coast Trolley). On November 21, 2021, the UC San Diego Blue Line light rail extension will open and expand the San Diego Trolley system from Downtown San Diego to the UTC Transit Center, serving nine new Trolley stations. It's only a 1 mile walk to The Shops at La Jolla Village (Whole Foods, Rubios, Nordstrom Rack, BJ's Restaurant, Snooze and CVS). And it's 1.5 miles to the UCSD campus (a 10 minute bike ride). It's about a 17 minute car ride to Downtown.
Cats ok. Dogs ok. No Smoking please. Wheelchair Accessible. EV Charging. Tenant pays for all utilities. Owner pays for HOA fees. One-year lease preferred. Deposit is $3,700.
For all inquires and to request a tour please reply via email or call/text Claire at  show contact info
.

A beautiful 2B/1BA property available for lease in the booming North Park area. North Park is a great area that is surrounded by local coffee shops, great restaurants, and shopping boutiques. The restaurant scene is awesome for getting brunch, or stopping by an upscale pub, taqueria, or sushi lounge. 

The home is a back unit on two-unit property. This property is in a quiet neighborhood with a small front yard that is perfect for grilling or hosting an afternoon happy hour. Upon entering the home you walk into a spacious living area with great natural light. Flat screen TV and ceiling fan are already installed in the living room to give you the perfect relaxation space with lots of air flow. The living area is connected to the newly updated kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, gorgeous countertops and tons of storage in the beautiful white cabinets. 

The bathroom is located between the living area and the two bedrooms. The bathroom has a large walk in shower with gorgeous tiling in the shower and sliding glass doors, along with matching white cabinets to give that clean and open look. 

Next are the two bedrooms that are decent size with plenty of closet space. Both come with ceiling fans already installed as well. Each room also has large windows to give the perfect amount of sunlight and have the same hardwood floors throughout the home.

Lease a large 2 bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,994 per month.

This 2 Bedroom will be available 12/15/2021.



Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

The Upgraded Apartment Homes at Casa Mira View offer an exclusive residential experience with tailored amenities including Nest® Thermostat, SkyBell® WiFi Video Doorbell, and other exquisite features.

description: upgraded 2 bedroom 2 bath condo is the largest floor plan in Verano. Dual master bedroom layout. Granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, new carpet and freshly painted, side by side washer/dryer, large patio area with private landscaped views. 2 underground, secure parking spaces. Additional parking pass that allows you to park in complex on a first-come basis. Complex features two pools, a fitness center, dry saunas and a cyber café with internet access. Pets negotiable with owners approval. Walking distance to Von's shopping center, La Jolla movie theater and UTC mall. UCSD buses stop right outside of the complex.

DESCRIPTION
Incredible 4BR/3BA Canyon View home in Mira Mesa.  1st time on the rental market.  Enter this spacious home into the formal living & dining room with 2-story cathedral ceilings.  There is a family room off to the right w/ a fireplace.  Both areas flow into the updated kitchen that comes with all stainless appliances.  Tons of designer cabinets with soft-close doors.  There is a bathroom downstairs, garage access, and the laundry room complete with full-size washer & dyer.  As you reach upstairs, what would be a 4th bedroom has been opened up to be a den, 2nd family room, office or playroom.  The master bedroom has vaulted ceilings, walk-in closet, and attached master bath w/ dual sinks.  (The master bath is getting a brand new shower installed! Excuse the mess in the pictures this will be completed soon.)  Enjoy the expansive canyon views.  The two other bedroom are both good size and share the hallway bathroom.  Best part of the house could be the HUGE yard!  There is a covered patio space, a playhouse, and a trampoline.  Even with all this you still have lots of extra space for playing or entertaining. All while enjoying the 270 degree canyon views.  Located on at the end of a cul-de-sac in a very low-traffic area, this home is still close to everything Mira Mesa has to offer.

Description

    Rennovation still in progress.  Estimated completion Nov. 27.

UNIT INFORMATION: 

This Amazing Two Bed Two Bath is a first floor corner unit  with direct access to outside across the main hall.  
Come home to a  light bright open floor plan with large sliding glass doors out to your private balcony for enjoying early moring coffee and filtered evening sunsets.  
It also offers beautiful crown moldings, mirrored closet doors, custom paint, Stainless dishwasher, microwave, fridge and stove. 
Updated cabinets, beautiful granite tops and updated lighting in living room. There is beautiful herringbone tile throughout the unit. 
The master bedroom with en suite is spacious with ample natural light.  The second bedroom makes an amazing guest room or office with the second bathroom located directly across the hall, just off the living space. 
Last but not least this unit comes with TWO parking spaces (tandem) in a gated garage along with a storage cabinet in front of your parking space. 

GENERAL BUILDING INFORMATION:

Tucked away on a dead end street , this is a prime Hillcrest Location. Only a short distance to the activities in hillcrest, You will love coming home to this peaceful hillside home. This location provides easy freeway access to I8 and the 163 to get anywhere in the city quickly!!! We are located between Scripts Mercy and UCSD Hospitals. The onsite laundry machines run through a prepaid APP so no quarters needed!!

description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large 2 bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,942 per month.

This 2 Bedroom will be available 12/15/2021.



Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

Total rent for 4 persons sharing apartment: $2,675 a month + $200 utilities

description:
Want to spend the winter in warm SoCal sunshine, steps away from the beach? (A block and a half, to be exact!) 

My cozy, light-filled, plant-filled, 1-bedroom, stand-alone cottage is available from December 13th through the end of January.

You would have the entire cottage to yourself! Located in the heart of Ocean Beach, walking distance to everything -- yoga, beach, restaurants, cafes, shops, grocery stores, etc.

No pets - no drugs - no smoking. My home is a beautiful, peaceful sanctuary of light & tranquility and I am looking for someone who will treat it with the same respect that I do. 

No assigned parking, but parking is easy - particularly at this time of year. Laundry on site. The cottage is small, but has a full kitchen, dining nook, living room, and separate bedroom with a queen size bed. High-speed wifi and a beach cruiser (bike) included!

Other charming touches in these fully renovated apartments include brand new kitchens with ALL new appliances, new cabinets, counters, brand new closets, new heaters, new flooring, new paint, crown molding, new recessed lighting, complete new bathrooms, new ceiling fans, with a beautiful new courtyard housing a tranquil water feature. Small, quiet complex with laundry room and use of Kayaks and Paddle Boards! Just a few units left, both upstairs and downstairs. 

These fully renovated units are just across the street to the famous Kellogg Beach! Close to yacht clubs, shopping, fine dining, and walking trails and right up the street from the Naval Base! In the heart of the prestigious La Playa neighborhood! This area offers unparalleled beach and water access, making it ideal for many water sports and activities including kayaking, SUP, walking, running, cycling, fishing and sailing. The San Diego Yacht Club is directly across the street, Southwestern Yacht Club, Shelter Island and numerous Point Loma eateries and small businesses are 1 - 4 blocks away. Most major San Diego attractions are less than a 10 minute drive from the condo; SD airport and Liberty station (Trader Joes, Vons, many eateries and services) are a 5 minute drive. The apartment location makes it an extremely attractive alternative to a downtown high rise or a residential area home with no view. It is hard to find an area in San Diego that presents this much opportunity for fun and recreation while still enjoying the feeling of living in a seaside village.

Requirements: Income 2 1/2 times rent, NO evictions, good credit and rental history. $40/adult application fee.

The property sits directly across the street from the 1.7 million sq. ft. Fashion Valley Mall, San Diego’s highest-grossing upscale lifestyle center, home to over 200 restaurants and shops. Fashion Valley's proximity means residents can walk across the street for a bite to eat at True Foods and catch the latest movie at the AMC Theater or shop at the region’s only Bloomingdale’s and Neiman Marcus before meeting with friends for cocktails at Stacked or the soon-to-open North Italia.Residents are always within walking distance of the lifestyle center, but they’re also just 5 to 15 minutes away from virtually everything else that San Diego has to offer. Visitors come from around the world to vacation on the white sand beaches of La Jolla, dine at the award winning restaurants in Downtown, and chill at the laid back craft breweries in North Park and Hillcrest— it’s no wonder Forbes recently named San Diego the third “Coolest City in the Nation.” With the nearest trolley station located at the other end of the Fashion Valley Mall, residents can do nearly all of this without ever having to set foot in a car. description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large Two bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,873 per month.

This Two Bedroom is available NOW!



Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

The Upgraded Apartment Homes at Casa Mira View offer an exclusive residential experience with tailored amenities including Nest® Thermostat, SkyBell® WiFi Video Doorbell, and other exquisite features.

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

We look forward to you joining us at Casa Mira View.

description:
me and see what the fuss is all about at Mesa Vista Apartments, located at 7980 Linda Vista Rd San Diego, CA 92111. Description........ Currently fully leased. Accepting applications for future available units.Let the inviting waters of the resort-style pool at Mesa Vista Apartments welcome you home. Bask in the warm rays of the sun in the modern lounge furniture, while cooking a delicious picnic meal on a BBQ fit for a chef. Enjoy beautiful tree-lined streets in the surrounding neighborhood while being minutes from all the shops, café's and restaurants the Clairemont Mesa district has to offer. Try a Thai tea at Boba Time, don't miss the Banh Mi at K's Sandwiches, or enjoy the unique food service as you grab a sushi roll from the conveyor belt at Kura Revolving Sushi bar.

Just minutes from freeway access, Mesa Vista Apartments is near all the main action San Diego has to offer. Take a trip to Ocean Beach, meander through beautiful Balboa park, grab a cocktail in Hillcrest and do some shopping in Fashion Valley. For those looking to take local classes, we are also located mere blocks from Mesa College and it is only a short drive to UC San Diego. 

At Mesa Vista Apartments we proudly offer 1, 2 and 3-bedroom homes with tastefully designed interiors and plank floors in select apartments. Floor plans boast large square footage with ample storage and spacious closets. Laundry facilities are available 24-hours a day for your convenience, and we are on-call for maintenance emergencies any time you need. We also love pets and invite you to bring them along to your new home. There is a gorgeous dog park near our community.

description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large One bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,695 per month.

This $2,525 Bedroom will be available January 14 th.



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. See life in all of its beautiful hues when you live at Casa Mira View. 

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more! 

The Villas at Casa Mira View will feature a variety of luxurious amenities! Future amenities to be released at the Villas will allow you to take a stroll through the Bloom Community Garden and enjoy The Green which serves as a multi-use area for our residents. View and admire the beautiful art sculptures that can be found in Courtyards. Challenge your friends with a variety of outdoor games including basketball at Rebound, the full-sized basketball court, Snookball, a fun take on combining soccer and billiards, or Bocce Ball. Splash in the new Cascada Saltwater Pool area which includes many new and exclusive features including the DJ Tower, the Cabanas on Second Level, the Splash Pad play area, a BBQ Counter and Entertainment Space, and showers to rinse off after having a fun day out in the sun.

Beautiful townhouse in highly desirable Carmel Valley neighborhood with a large private patio! Fresh paint, highly upgraded, very clean, move-in ready. This 3 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom is in meticulous condition and has a great open floor plan, which makes it feel larger than its 1,368 SqFt. It features updated beautiful birch hardwood floors in the main living area, custom tile in the kitchen, and plush carpet upstairs. The front door enters a foyer that opens up to a spacious living room with fireplace and large sliding glass door with great natural light to the private patio. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with high-end stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, and granite counters.

All bedrooms are equipped with a ceiling fans, new dual pane windows and plantation shutters, and large closets. The master bedroom features an ensuite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower and dual sink.

Full size Washer & Dryer in unit. The home as an assigned one-car garage with optional outdoor parking. The complex features a community pool and tennis courts. No smoking. Pets allowed with restrictions.

Schools nearby include Carmel Del Mar Elementary, Carmel Valley Middle, and Torrey Pines High School. Commuting is convenient with quick access to Interstate 5 and 805, and Highway 56. The property is is close to shopping, grocery, restaurants and is a quick trip to Del Mar village and beaches, Del Mar Highlands, UCSD campus, and Sorrento Valley. Trips to unspoiled Solana Beach or stunning Torrey Pines State Reserve and Torrey Pines Golf Course are also just beyond the neighborhood.

Listing and marketing information provided is deemed reliable and accurate but not guaranteed - agent, broker, and tenant should confirm all property information and specifications before entering rental agreement.

Throughout the communities, you’ll find a selection of pet-friendly one- and two-bedroom luxury floor plans with plank flooring and sizable kitchens boasting stainless-steel appliances. description:
SAN DIEGO, MISSION VALLEY, LINDA VISTA LUXURY APARTMENTS Welcome to the life above. description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large 2 bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,827 per month.

This 2 Bedroom will be available NOW.



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. See life in all of its beautiful hues when you live at Casa Mira View.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

The Villas at Casa Mira View will feature a variety of luxurious amenities! Future amenities to be released at the Villas will allow you to take a stroll through the Bloom Community Garden and enjoy The Green which serves as a multi-use area for our residents. View and admire the beautiful art sculptures that can be found in Courtyards. Challenge your friends with a variety of outdoor games including basketball at Rebound, the full-sized basketball court, Snookball, a fun take on combining soccer and billiards, or Bocce Ball. Splash in the new Cascada Saltwater Pool area which includes many new and exclusive features including the DJ Tower, the Cabanas on Second Level, the Splash Pad play area, a BBQ Counter and Entertainment Space, and showers to rinse off after having a fun day out in the sun.

Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large Two bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,843 per month.

This Two Bedroom is available now.



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. See life in all of its beautiful hues when you live at Casa Mira View. 

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more! 

The Villas at Casa Mira View will feature a variety of luxurious amenities! Future amenities to be released at the Villas will allow you to take a stroll through the Bloom Community Garden and enjoy The Green which serves as a multi-use area for our residents. View and admire the beautiful art sculptures that can be found in Courtyards. Challenge your friends with a variety of outdoor games including basketball at Rebound, the full-sized basketball court, Snookball, a fun take on combining soccer and billiards, or Bocce Ball. Splash in the new Cascada Saltwater Pool area which includes many new and exclusive features including the DJ Tower, the Cabanas on Second Level, the Splash Pad play area, a BBQ Counter and Entertainment Space, and showers to rinse off after having a fun day out in the sun.

Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community.  to text us.Need more information? Copy this link:http://rwselby.aptdetails.com/539q56 APEX MISSION VALLEY LUXURY APARTMENTS  This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1155 Sq. Ft.  Apex Mission Valley Apartments is nestled in the heart of Mission Valley— one of San Diego’s most popular and amenity-rich neighborhoods. The property sits directly across the street from the 1.7 million sq. ft. Fashion Valley Mall, San Diego’s highest-grossing upscale lifestyle center, home to over 200 restaurants and shops. Fashion Valley's proximity means residents can walk across the street for a bite to eat at True Foods and catch the latest movie at the AMC Theater or shop at the region’s only Bloomingdale’s and Neiman Marcus before meeting with friends for cocktails at Stacked or the soon-to-open North Italia.Residents are always within walking distance of the lifestyle center, but they’re also just 5 to 15 minutes away from virtually everything else that San Diego has to offer. Visitors come from around the world to vacation on the white sand beaches of La Jolla, dine at the award winning restaurants in Downtown, and chill at the laid back craft breweries in North Park and Hillcrest— it’s no wonder Forbes recently named San Diego the third “Coolest City in the Nation.” With the nearest trolley station located at the other end of the Fashion Valley Mall, residents can do nearly all of this without ever having to set foot in a car. Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large 2 bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2,799 per month.

This 2 Bedroom will be available December 3rd.



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, concert stage, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. See life in all of its beautiful hues when you live at Casa Mira View.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

description:
me see this wonderful and open space 2 bedroom and 2 1/2 bath condo located in Atrium Promenade at Spectrum!

The home built in 2014 includes 1,339 of living space. The kitchen has quartz counter tops, decorative backsplash, stainless steel & black appliances (refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, oven, microwave), reverse osmosis drinking water filtration system, half bath, walk-in pantry, plenty of storage space, and tile flooring throughout. The smart home includes a smart thermostat, garage, front door lock, front door camera, and light switches that can be controlled remotely with your mobile device. Luxury shutters are installed throughout the home. The living room has a built-in 5.1 surround sound speakers and ceiling fan.

Upstairs you have 2 bedrooms each with their own private full restroom and ceiling fan. The master bathroom has quartz counter tops & backsplash and a walk-in closet. The bathrooms have tile flooring and carpet in the bedrooms. The laundry room is accessed right above the stairs with a stacked washer and dryer.

Central Heating & Air Conditioning and tankless water heater, along with a 2-car detached garage with additional storage space.

Promenade is a friendly and welcoming community with a common area that includes a BBQ area and gym. Enjoy the amazing selection of dining, shopping, and entertainment close by, as well as the neighboring Centrum Park (5 min walk). Highways are conveniently located nearby next to the new Kaiser Hospital.

Tenant pays for gas, electricity, water, sewer, cable, and internet. Tenant is responsible for replacing HVAC and water filters. Owner pays for trash.

See link below:http://rwselby.aptdetails.com/1w0799 APEX MISSION VALLEY LUXURY APARTMENTS  This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1155 Sq. Ft.  Apex Mission Valley Apartments is nestled in the heart of Mission Valley— one of San Diego’s most popular and amenity-rich neighborhoods. The property sits directly across the street from the 1.7 million sq. ft. Fashion Valley Mall, San Diego’s highest-grossing upscale lifestyle center, home to over 200 restaurants and shops. Fashion Valley's proximity means residents can walk across the street for a bite to eat at True Foods and catch the latest movie at the AMC Theater or shop at the region’s only Bloomingdale’s and Neiman Marcus before meeting with friends for cocktails at Stacked or the soon-to-open North Italia.Residents are always within walking distance of the lifestyle center, but they’re also just 5 to 15 minutes away from virtually everything else that San Diego has to offer. Visitors come from around the world to vacation on the white sand beaches of La Jolla, dine at the award winning restaurants in Downtown, and chill at the laid back craft breweries in North Park and Hillcrest— it’s no wonder Forbes recently named San Diego the third “Coolest City in the Nation.” With the nearest trolley station located at the other end of the Fashion Valley Mall, residents can do nearly all of this without ever having to set foot in a car. Join us! Call today and schedule your tour with one of our friendly leasing professionals!  Pet Policy:Pets - allowed Office Hours:Monday-Sunday:9:00AM-6:00PMEqual Housing Opportunity r6Ce92B

Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large one bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $3,150 per month.

This One Bedroom is available NOW! 

It has luxury features like:

•	Marble countertops
•	Tiled kitchen/bathroom
•	Extra bathroom shelving (next to toilet)
•	Grab bars next to toilet, shower, and inside shower

Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

The Upgraded Apartment Homes at Casa Mira View offer an exclusive residential experience with tailored amenities including Nest® Thermostat, SkyBell® WiFi Video Doorbell, and other exquisite features.

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

We look forward to you joining us at Casa Mira View.

Pacific Beach, First floor unit 1 block to the beach! Large windows in living room fills the unit with a waterfall of natural light. Community Description

Welcome to the Hidden Gem of Mira Mesa, The Mesa Village Apartment Community, where an urban lifestyle and luxury blend to offer you a wonderful place to call home. Our community offers you a world of convenience both on and off the property. Commuting is made easy with nearby access to major highways.

Escape to your own oasis within one of our spacious one or two-bedroom floor plans. Once inside you will be met with updated kitchens and bathrooms, stainless steel appliances and a balcony or patio for soaking in the California sun. Enjoy the conveniences our apartment homes offer such as dishwashers, central air conditioning, and in selected homes, washer & dryers. At Mesa Village, residents enjoy a lifestyle that exceeds expectations. Our pet-friendly community caters to a range of activities and luxuries. description:
We are now accepting applications for 
a Townhouse at 4770 Caminito Canor in Canyon Ridge, Carmel Valley - please do not disturb the tenant.  We can show it closer to the move out date.  I apologize for the terrible pictures - these were taken before the current tenant moved in 

This is a gated community with a pool and spa.  
Though it is typically listed as a townhome community, Canyon Ridge is in fact a gated, twinhome community (with 2 car attached garages).

Built by Baldwin Homes and Warmington Homes between 1993 and 1995, and comprised of 116 two-story residences, this beautiful gated community is located south and west of the intersection of Del Mar Heights Road and Carmel Canyon Road, respectively.

Amenities at Canyon Ridge include a pool, spa and recreation center.

Regarding accessibility, the community is in a great spot, with Ashley Falls Park and Carmel Knolls Park both within walking distance.

In addition, Canyon Ridge is within:

0.8 mi of Route 56.
1 mi of all schools.
1.1 mi of Del Mar Highlands Town Center.
1.3 mi of One Paseo.
1.5 mi of The Village at Pacific Highlands Ranch.
1.8 mi of Interstate 5.
3 mi of the beaches of Del Mar.

Very private and secure.  

3 bedroom 2.5 bathrooms




Award Winning San Dieguito School District walking distance to Torrey Pines High School, Del Mar Highlands, and One Paseo.  Neighborhoods: Canyon Ridge 
Equipment: Range/Oven

Welcome to Sola at Pacific Highlands Ranch! Each Carmel Valley apartment offers spacious open-concept living and stunning design touches. Our community is also proud to be pet-friendly, offering a dog park and spa for your four-legged companions!

The apartment homes at Sola are designed to radiate elegance, artistry, and poise. Spacious floor plans accompany unparalleled interior luxuries including gourmet kitchens, stainless steel appliances, designer bathrooms, and wood-style plank flooring.

As a resident, you’ll have access to many dining options, trendy bars, and plenty of shopping destinations! description:
Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large 2 bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2827 per month.

This 2 Bedroom is available NOW.



Casa Mira View features extraordinary amenities and beautifully landscaped grounds with spectacular art and sculptures throughout the community. Our community boasts gorgeous pools and spa areas, like saltwater pools and spa, a rooftop retreat and a community center previously unheard of in the San Diego area! Outdoor playgrounds, indoor play area, train, carousel, life sized chess boards, bowling alley and retail shops are but a few of the fabulous amenities offered. The state of the art fitness facility is equipped with cutting edge equipment, outdoor lap pool, high intensity training area, and monthly classes to keep you motivated. Casa Mira View also offers retail boutiques just steps away from your door including a Café, Studio V Salon, and FIDUS Pet Concierge.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

The Upgraded Apartment Homes at Casa Mira View offer an exclusive residential experience with tailored amenities including Nest® Thermostat, SkyBell® WiFi Video Doorbell, and other exquisite features.

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

Welcome to Casa Mira View! 

Lease a large One bedroom at Casa Mira View on a one year lease for $2475 per month.

This One Bedroom will be available January 3rd



Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, concert stage, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. See life in all of its beautiful hues when you live at Casa Mira View.

The Central Bark Dog Park has just opened at our newest phase, The Villas at Casa Mira View! Bring your furry friend to the Central Bark dog park and enjoy this gorgeous San Diego weather. We also offer FIDUS Pet Concierge for your companions which includes dog walking, pet sitting, dog and cat grooming, and more!

Casa Mira View’s location is ideally situated in the Scripps corridor — with easy access to I-15, you won’t need to travel far to experience everything San Diego has to offer. The community boasts great shopping, dining, and entertainment.

We are proudly a 100% smoke-free community. Pets accepted in select apartment homes; two pet maximum and breed restrictions apply. Please contact the leasing office for details. Sorry, but cosigners are not accepted.

description:
lairemont /Bay Ho: $4000 House
3br/3ba w/pool, solar, fenced yard and large deck overlooking Tecolote Canyon. 

ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED WITH RENT: Gas, Electric, water, trash, Pool service, landscaping, quarterly pest control (Overuse of utilities would cost more).
- Main bedroom has a shower/tub with jets, a walk-in closet and 2nd closet. Sliding doors to the back yard.
- 2nd bedroom has a sliding door to a side deck. Hallway bathroom across from bedroom just remodeled.
- 3rd bedroom is detached and has it's own bathroom. 
- Central Heating and Electric Water Heater are only 1 year old.
No a/c, but the house catches a nice breeze and there are ceiling fans in every room.
- Gas Stove, side by side Refrigerator/Freezer, Microwave, Stainless sinks, Garage Disposal, Stainless dishwasher.
Clothes Washer and Dryer are in the garage, which is not big enough for a car, but can fit multiple motorcycles. 
- Driveway fits 1 car and there is street parking for 2 or more. The house is on a cul-de-sac, so additional parking is always available. 
Privacy wall in front of the house.
Close to freeways (5, 805, 52), Downtown, Beaches and shopping. 

Fireplaces are gas, and we prefer that they not be used at all since there is a brand new heating system. 

Available Jan 1st, 2022.
1st and last months rent at lease signing, 2 references and background check required. 
Small dog or cat is negotiable, $100 pet deposit required. 
Smoking outside the house only please.
No HOA or anything oppressive like that.
Friendly and private neighborhood. 

**Owners would have access to the property, with use of the pool. Owners would be staying in a small studio in the back when in town, average one night every two weeks. 
If you are willing to accept mail and packages for the owners to pickup when in town, the rent will be slightly discounted.

description:
me and enjoy resort-style living at The Plaza in Pacific Beach! Nestled in a quiet area of the complex, this unit offers a small private patio where you can relax and unwind while soaking in the idyllic San Diego weather all year long. As you enter you will gaze upon an open floor plan that allows the living room, dining area and kitchen to flow seamlessly together for ease of daily living. The kitchen features crisp, white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops accented by a decorative backsplash and an eat-at breakfast bar.

The bathroom has been upgraded to feature a shiplap accent wall, custom countertops, sink, mirror and lighting, plus a subway shower surround. The bedroom provides enough room for rest, work and exercise - perfect in these modern times! Three closets provide plenty of storage space. One car detached garage adds extra storage space and makes parking a breeze - a plus for a beach community! The Plaza is a gated community that offers its residents four serene courtyards each with pool, spa and gas BBQ’s, five lighted tennis courts, one fitness center, separate men’s and women’s saunas, a media room, and a tranquil lagoon. Leave the car parked, as shopping, dining and entertainment venues are close by. Pacific Beach is a relaxed neighborhood by the beach offering a meandering boardwalk dotted with boutiques, fitness studios and trendy bars and cafes.

Experience incredibly spacious one, two and three bedroom residences for rent in San Diego that are a cut above. The amenities at Casa Mira View fulfill the day to night promise of complete luxury and enjoyment. Discover the resort pools & spas, scenic rooftop spa deck retreat, bowling alley, Move True Fitness Center, tech lounge, and much, much more. Living in San Diego has its definite perks. Have your choice of abundant outdoor recreation, beaches and trails, upscale shopping & gourmet dining downtown, as well as a tremendous appreciation for the arts. -YES AVAILABLE (-'furnished' only)...    we're seeking a quality applicant (-one person only, no couples); -must provide clear pic of themself to apply; -and please no 3rd-party solicitors such as realtors...
~Quiet safe delightfully cozy rustic sanctuary, -plus having the luxury of one's very own secure outdoor-yard area,  suitable for a cheerful quiet sober health-oriented clean reliable single-tenant, -possibly with a sociable sporting or shepherd type dog (-must be QUIET, no chronic barkers)!  Easygoing albeit discerning conservative landlord architectural-designer, has completely renovated this detached 'Casita' pvt.-entry 1-Bedroom,  with all new electricals/plumbing, and a secure/Pvt.-backyard which commercial-units do not offer!.    A very Pvt./gated-entryway (w/keylock, and security/intercom-doorbell) from street, securely fenced-yard, French-door entry.  Ambiance includes imported TerraCotta-tile flooring, a rustic-style vaulted open-beam ceiling with new insulated-roof, elect.-AC/heat&cooling, instant-gas/hot-water, Kitchen-area w/built-in Stainless-Refrig., Gar.-disposal; Garden-window where an Inverter/Microwave-oven; Avanti-Hotplate('induction'-type w/timer) are conveniently situated, and has full-BathRm. replete with front-loading Wash./Dryer(LG-combo 'all-in-one'). 
The living-rm. has a large oak/Rolltop-desk (-suitable for computer-operations), -while the Bedrm. is also open-beamed, with a 12ft./Book-shelf, Ceiling-fan w/light, X.long-Bed, beautiful large wardrobe Armoire, and a Drawer-chest.  Internet-service included (-no phone), -as are Velour-drapes, --and includes your own off-street Parking-spot. Plus, if you've a canine-pal they'll really love their own Lrg./doggie-door; securely-fenced yard, and being adjacent a wonderful dog-friendly Park, where my gentle G.Shepherd insists we go morning/evening, -often off-leash!  
Secluded in a very safe/quiet area of n.w.SerraMesa 3-blocks south of AeroDrive (-west-end), -with quick access downtown via Fwy.-163; --and is situated just 3.5-miles directly eastwardly inland of Mission-Bay. This is a Casita (-small detached cottage) -only for a single-person (for 1. sorry no couples) a quiet mature health-oriented non-smoker of anything!
NOTE: a reliable-income and upstanding character are essential; --if interested one must initially submit background info. about themselves, along with a clear 'no-sunglasses' pic of you and any quiet dog, in order to receive our response, --then we can go from there if it seems we may be compatible neighbors. Why pay more for noisy door-slamming Apt.-living, where one's dog is confined inside; --dogs like to come and go outside, chase around, and just be themselves within a secure yard, where you know they'll be safe while you're away!

RENTAL-TERMS:    6-mos./Minimum-lease with Utilities is...    $1,960 (1st-month),  -and $1,960 (Last-month), +$395/Sec.-deposit,  =Totaling: ... $4,315.oo for the Keys.   (-Or, a 'fast-track favored-tenant' $100-mo. *Discount is offered by paying 6-mos. in Advance:  *$11,555.oo)
Requirements include (-waived if you opt for *6mos./Advance-payment Discount-plan):
Good/Credit-rating; good/Rental-history (-Refs.); Monthly/gross-income of at least... 2.25-X monthly-rent; have same Employment for past 6-months; No recent eviction nor bankruptcy.  Be prepared to show: -copy of your Credit-report, two-consecutive Bank-statements or Pay-stubs, or most recent Tax-filing. We do a Character-check, -but do not charge 'pesky' Application-fees, - expect Tenant to demonstrate sufficient income, --or have a verifiably-reliable Co-signer! 

E-mail me via upper-left 'Reply'-button, necessarily including clear-photo of yourself and any Doggy-pal (-sorry no Pitbulls/Bull-tarriers or aggressive dog allowed by Insur.Co., --but a socially-friendly  Retriever, Shepherd, -etc. are welcomed as long as not a chronic-barker!). ---will reciprocate with official/Landlord-pic.   
This CL-ad will be removed immediately upon leasing, -thus any e-mail response asking if still available? -will be ignored as spam; -and we're not initially interested in discussing this by phone; --we need proper-info. about YOU that conveys why we should want you as a tenant under our common-roof !  Also, no unhealthy/Mask-wearing on premises, -simply take daily/Nutritional-supplements as informed-MD's advise, and you'll NEVER catch any Flu-virus!!!
 ~Robair,  -Landlor
